document.full_text: amgen inc , whose cash balance has soared even as its core anemia drug franchise erodes, will outline its strategy -- and likely announce its first dividend -- at a meeting on thursday with wall street.
document.title: amgen to outline strategy at investor meeting
lines_and_colors: amgen inc , whose cash balance has soared even as its core anemia drug franchise erodes, will outline its strategy -- and likely announce its first dividend -- at a meeting on thursday with wall street.
